import React from 'react' import{Card,CardBody} from 'reactstrap' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import './tour-card.css' const TourCard = ({tour}) => { // const {id,title, city, price,avgRating,photo} = tour const totalRating = tour.reviews?.reduce((acc,item)=>acc+item.rating ,0) const avgRating = totalRating ===0 ? "" : totalRating ===1 ? totalRating : totalRating/reviews?.length return (
{tour.featured &&Featured}
{tour.city} 9 {tour.avgRating}{" "} ({tour.reviews.length})
{tour.title}
${tour.price} /per/person
) } export default TourCard
